name: CO2 equivalent from energy sources - IPCC (2011)
title: CO2 equivalent from energy sources - IPCC (2011)
description: Data reported as the median grams of carbon dioxide equivalents per kWh (gCO2e per kWh) based on life-cycle analysis of energy production sources.

Seyboth, P. Matschoss, S. Kadner, T. Zwickel, P. Eickemeier, G. Hansen, S. Schlömer, C. von Stechow (eds)], Cambridge University Press, Cambridge, United Kingdom and New York, NY, USA.
sources.additionalInfo: Data reported as the median grams of carbon dioxide equivalents per kWh (gCO2e per kWh) based on life-cycle analysis of energy production sources.
